short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Customize your cursor by uploading a picture

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Transform your browsing experience with Cursor Customizer! This easy-to-use Chrome extension allows you to personalize your cursor by uploading any JPG image. Whether you want a playful icon, a professional pointer, or a seasonal theme, Cursor Customizer lets you express your unique style with just a few clicks.
